title: july 5: arthur ashe wins wimbledon
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks Arthur Ashe, the first Black man to win Wimbledon. After, she reflects on “Somebody That I Used to Know.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
